title: Two arrested in protest outside L.A. synagogue featuring Israeli defense firm
description: Police arrested two people for battery and vandalism as protesters targeted speakers from Israel's police and Elbit Systems. Mayor Karen Bass and the synagogue's rabbi condemned the demonstration as antisemitic, calling it 'a disturbing outbreak of hate'
content: An anti-Israel demonstration outside a prominent Los Angeles synagogue led to two arrests on Wednesday, drawing condemnation from the city's mayor, who decried the protesters' behavior as antisemitic… [+6085 chars]

raw_data.author: Louis Keene, The Forward
